routes.pageSubtitle: Choose from the most spectacular destinations in Paraty and embark on an unforgettable journey through the crystal clear waters of the Rio de Janeiro coast

sacoMamangua.descricao: Navigate through Brazil's only tropical fjord. Stunning landscapes surrounded by mountains covered with Atlantic rainforest.

ilhaPelado.descricao: Discover one of the most charming islands in the region with transparent waters and white sand beaches. Perfect for diving and relaxation.

ilhaCedro.descricao: Paradisiacal island with preserved vegetation and secret coves. A true refuge of tranquility and natural beauty.

ilhaMantimentos.descricao: Explore isolated beaches and crystal clear waters on this enchanting island. Ideal for those seeking privacy and contact with nature.

lagoaVerde.descricao: Lagoon with crystal clear emerald waters surrounded by lush nature. A hidden paradise perfect for diving and contemplation.

praiaSobrado.descricao: Protected cove with calm waters and fine sand. A hidden paradise accessible only by boat.

praiaEngenho.descricao: Historic beach surrounded by lush nature. Combine history, culture and natural beauties in a single destination.

praiaCrepusculo.descricao: Famous for its spectacular sunsets. Experience magical moments as the sun sets over the tranquil waters of Paraty.

passeioPersonalizado.descricao: Create your own adventure! Design an exclusive itinerary according to your preferences, choosing destinations, activities, and tour duration.
